Uses of Class
pythagoras.d.Box

  • Packages that use Box 
    Package Description
    pythagoras.d
    The Pythagoras geometry utility classes specialized on double.

    • Uses of Box in pythagoras.d

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Box Box.EMPTY
      The empty box.
      static Box Box.MAX_VALUE
      A box that's as large as boxes can get.
      static Box Box.UNIT
      The unit box.
      static Box Box.ZERO
      The zero box.
